author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Note: The NPS Museum Conservation Lab's future is uncertain; it had its lease canceled by Doge, then extended by one year only. 

In conservation, it's not always about the perfect material but how the light plays ON that material. At @NationalParkService Museum Conservation Lab, book and paper conservator Allison Holcomb teaches Adam Savage a method for creating fake leather as a repair material and for filling losses in original books. What do you think of Adam's final effort?

National Park Museum Conservation Lab: https://www.nps.gov/subjects/hfc/museum-conservation-services.htm
National Park Service: https://www.nps.gov/index.htm
What Happens When Taxidermy Fails: https://youtu.be/_ovkiZfl9aw
Where America’s Historical Artifacts Are Being Preserved (Well ... For Now): https://youtu.be/1lxSXvLGvcs
How to Wash a 157-Year-Old Newspaper: https://youtu.be/P3J-ToojchA
Ouch! Here's What Happened: https://youtu.be/L8MDAmCpzyA
Follow the NPS Museum Conservation Lab here: https://www.insta
title: Adam Savage Makes "Leather" Out of Silicone
